AnyBreak.name: After any party member inflicts a BREAK

GroupCritical.name: When dealing a critical hit with a Group BRV Attack

InflictBreakAttackBreak.name: When inflicting BREAK or attacking a target afflicted with BREAK

AttackBreak.name: When attacking a target afflicted with BREAK

HPOver80.name: While HP is ≥ 80% of Max HP

FinalWaveHPOver50.name: While HP is ≥ 50% of Max HP at start of final wave

KnockBack.name: When attacking during a Knock Back

HPUnder80.name: While HP is ≤ 80% of Max HP

Group.name: When attacking with a Group BRV Attack

NotTargetingYou.name: When attacking an enemy not targeting self

Target1Critical.name: When dealing a critical hit to a single target

TargetingYou.name: When attacking an enemy targeting self

InflictBreakAttackBreakHPOver100.name: While HP is Max and inflicting BREAK or attacking a target afflicted with BREAK

HPUnder50HPDamage.name: When taking HP damage and while HP is ≤ 50%

WhileBuffed5.name: While 5 or more buffs are active

WhileBuffed3.name: While 3 or more buffs are active

HPOver100Critical.name: While HP is Max and dealing a critical hit

MAXBRVOver50.name: While current BRV is ≥ 50% of MAX BRV
